caption: Good Brick Oven Pizza

Great service and the pizza tastes like it was cooked right out of Italy. Beautiful brick oven. The food is so good I went back for another pizza. I will be back for more. And they made my pizza heart shaped for V day.
Just walked by this place and heard the presumed owner, a White guy, berating a delivery person, a Black guy, super condescendingly. Don't go here. #BuyBlack

This was my first and last time going here for pizza. And allow me to say that I never right reviews ever. But my experience here was absolutely terrible. I got a margarita pie. The cheese was so chewy and clumped up, and the cheese was sliding off of the bread considering how watery the actual tomato sauce was. It didn't just have bad texture but also left a bad taste in my mouth. I also got a (home-made) tiramisu and it was sour... Which is short to say they served me expired dessert. I've never thrown out a pizza pie over one slice in my entire life until today.
The best pizza in harlem hands down
Great White pizza.....kinda weird not in bklyn........

IN THE NEW COVID WORLD, FOOD MASKS MATTER. I've been going to Harlem pizza for years, since the day they opened. I love their pizza, it's great. Unfortunately, in this new world we live in, pretending to wear masks by hanging them under your chin or under your nose doesn't cut it, especially when you're handling the food, the box it comes in, and when we have to go into the same room with the staff to pay for it and pick it up. Before covid, it would be a 5 star, but I'm disappointed enough in the restaurant to have to post this and hope either some change will come out of it or I can just inform others that this is how your food will be prepared and waiting for you.  I picked up a pizza a few weeks ago and asked the staff to put their masks fully on. They smiled and kept working without them. I walked by today to see them still working the same way.  I see someone else posted 2 months before me about the place not adhering to covid best practices, so this can be an update to all reading that they are still maintaining the status quo even though managements response to the other post was that they will improve. Talk is cheap.

First time visiting this spot they adhere to social distancing rules but nobody wore a mask. While making pizza and touching the food items they would touch the tablet / mobile device.  Glad the food was hot to kill the germs but food safety rules lacking? Unless they sanitize the devices but I doubt that.
Worst pizza experience just order veggie pizza,delivery man doesn’t want to go upstairs lazy:) and just deliver burning pizza,never again!!!

My first try at this pizza joint and I was knocked over with the taste of my pizza!!! It was a Cheese Me White pizza adding anchovies. Holy shiznit it was GREAT! Probably the best pizza I’ve had on the east coast good!! Since the pizzas were 12” I ordered a veggie-white pizza too. It was good but it had bacon on it. I was a bit confused but I love bacon, so it all worked out.  The baby arugula salad was fresh and very good!!! Unfortunately they were out of the Tiramisu. It sounded Sooo good. Maybe on my next order and there WILL BE a next order!!! Thanks Harlem Pizza for the friendly customer service and great tasting food!!
great pizza and friendly service.

I ordered a pepperoni pizza yesterday with a Caesar salad. Waited an hour and a half for it to arrive, the pizza was cold and they forgot the salad. Company would not refund my money would not send a fresh order. Don’t waste your time here
Delicious pizzas!

One of the best (if not the best) pizza spots in the neighborhood. I don't like their online menu/website as they don't have normal pizzas that you can order (like pepperoni/sausage: just call in advance),  but i respect that oven that they have (never saw/seen an oven like that).  Pizza tastes superior to any pizza I've tasted in the neighborhood albeit a little pricey (chop it up to quality).  Great customer service. Would definitely recommend.  And they deliver (if you have an ordering app.).  Formerly Bad Horse Pizza Co..

I ordered a Margherita for delivery. That's Pizza Place 101. It came without basil, burned and cold. It was made wrong, cooked wrong and delivered wrong. If you can't get a Margherita five blocks away without messing up every single part of the process, it's time to close shop.
Great pizza and nice sit down area.
The Margherita pizza is absolutely delicious and the place is super cosy! I strongly recommend!
Best pizza in the city, hands down.

I went on a Saturday night to grab a bite and was delightfully greeted by the warmth of the employees working there. It's a nice small, cute place, where you can take your significant other for a sweet date. I was pleasantly surprised that the pizza I ordered was made right in front of me from scratch. The pizza was delicious and definitely worth the price for having a fresh pizza. LOVED IT!

I was treated to lunch by a friend while on a work break and I must say that I was pleasantly surprised, while I have not gotten to far down the menu yet, it's definitely a good bite and you actually Taste the ingredients ah memories.... .. sorry drifted off their.. I'm going back and you should too! Recommended

(Translated by Google) A good dough for a nice pizza! I took the daisy to take away, next time I eat there to hear good jazz in the background!  (Original) Un buon impasto per una pizza gradevole! Ho preso la margherita a portar via, prossima volta mangio lì a sentire buona musica jazz di sottofondo!

Pizza is good, not the best. A little small. Decent prices, could ve a little better. Not my preferences in crust, nit not a bad place. Sauce was goos. Just not in love with it. Great customer service.
Pizza is great
Great pizza a lil $$ but worth it and you can eat indoors or outdoors.
Delicious pizza baked in a brick oven quickly
Fresh hand made pizza as you wait

My first review of a place that delivers ever... 4 h wait for a simple pizza. The woman who answers the phone could barely speak and still somehow lied 3 times that the driver had already left with my order. 4 h later, they closed for the day, the card is charged, no pizza obviously. These guys will lose all of the customers in no time
It took 80 minutes to be delivered. Pizza arrived cold.
The lamb sausage was AMAZING on the pizza!! The pizza is always delicious here.
Great food and service
Slow service and the pizza is mediocre.
Great pizza!

Exactly the kind of pizza I don't like. This is Manhattan, it should be better. 1) Sauce was too thick and herb tasting 2) Dough was too thick 3) Cheese did not have a hint of pecorino, even though it is stated as an ingredient on the menu.
Excellent pizza!!!
Wow!! The pizza are crazy good and the waiter was the best I had since a long time ! Best pizza in NY 🤪

(Translated by Google) For the outward appearance you could run, but incredibly the best pizza I have eaten in New York  (Original) Por el aspecto exterior podrías irte corriendo, pero increíblemente la mejor pizza que he comido en Nueva York
Another neighborhood gem, with a real  Handmade oven(I believe its made of Clay) with a mosaic application on the outside. Pizza is really good, with different styles and toppings.
Loved the crust! Fire grilled and crispy but not too thin.
I constantly arrive getting some food here. I enjoyed the swift service and well cooked dishes. Fantastic work.
Excellent service and food. Would recommend if you're in the Harlem area and wanna get some pizza.
(Translated by Google) The best pizza of my life I think 😍🤤  (Original) Les meilleures pizza de ma vie je crois 😍🤤
Enjoyed Harlem Pizza Co. The pizza was very good and services was very good.Try The Harlem Pizza Co 2 day💝
(Translated by Google) Very good pizza. Very nice home  (Original) Pizza très bonne. Accueil très sympa
Very yummy pizza.   Great place to people watch and relax.
Super amazing place. Incredible Pizza, reasonable prices, fresh ingredients, cool staff, nice ambiance. We will be back
Fresh-tasting sauce, great cheese, and friendly service! 5 stars

Wow!!!  Experience: Atmosphere was great. There was a decent amount of seating for this smaller average size place.  Service: Excellent. Very attentive wait staff. We were there during a slower time of day. Never ran out of drinks and the food came quickly and properly.  Food: Great. I’m not pizza connoisseur but it was really good. We tried two types which were both good.  Overall: we loved it and would definitely return.
(Translated by Google) Good and very friendly staff  (Original) Bon et personnel très aimable

This is a photo of what’s left of the custom pizza and calzone we ordered. It was delicious. My daughter ordered a Caesar salad and that was finished too. It’s a pizza place that’s nice but not too “nice” (meaning it’s comfortable, not fancy) and has a wide selection of specialty pies, all very enticing to order. The chef and waiter are both friendly and clearly care. Im planning to come back soon and will remember to orde the Apple crisp dessert early (there’s a 15 minute wait) because I just know I’m going to love it.
Passing by
Good pizza interesting flavors. Casual seating, seems mostly take out

One on the best pizzas I have ever had which is saying a lot. If your around the area I highly suggest you grab a bite here. Our server was also very fast, responsive, and helpful. As well as the rest of the staff. Great atmosphere guys!

This will ruin your Pizza experience. After having a Pizza of this quality you will never be able to eat just a regular old slice, from the home made  Pizza dough to the beautiful fresh ingredients that are on it, this is Pizza you will forever remember.
I would call this place overpriced. Their serving size is pretty small. We ordered three pizzas for three people and it got over in minutes. The toppings were minimal but delicious!
Great prices, Great staff, Great food.
Ceasar salad is huge (we split it three ways) The sweet and fatty hit spots we didn't even know we had. Finished it out with a Nutella calzone. Will stop by every time we're in town.
Best pizza in Harlem

this place is located in the heart of Harlem. I really enjoyed their Brick Oven pizzas and got to pies freshly made in less than 10 minutes. The staff is really friendly and the restaurant is super clean. This is definitely a place I will return to as I commute in and out of the city.

Ok so full review: The appetizer: AMAZING. We were so pleasantly surprised by the toasted truffle bites, and the salad, srsly i would go back just for those....  I had the cauliflower pizza and my boyfriend had the margarita. He loves traditional and his was just up to par, mine was AMAZING. Seriously i am a sauce freak and the cauliflower pizza with the bacon and caramelized onion were insanely good. Best pizza without red sauce I've ever had...  Samantha was a sweetheart and we felt so attended to. Such a great experience!!
Casual Gourmet Pizza. Hits the spot!
(Translated by Google) Delicious homemade pizza! Made in the oven!  (Original) Pizza caseira deliciosa! Feita no forno!
Traditional Italian meets cutting edge genius. Sit down, eat there.

(Translated by Google) Immersed in Harlem, a typical Afro-American neighborhood in NY, we came across Harlem pizza. I decided to try pizza as they do it in the big apple, we stopped, initially skeptical, used to eating pizza in Italy, but the result surprised us. In fact, we were all satisfied with the pizza served, which has nothing to envy to many Italian pizzerias, good.  (Original) Immersa nell'Harlem, tipico quartiere afroamericano di NY, ci siamo imbattuti in Harlem pizza. Decisi a provare la pizza come la fanno nella grande mela, ci siamo fermati, inizialmente scettici, abituati a mangiare pizza in Italia, ma il risultato ci ha sorpresi. Infatti tutti siamo stati soddisfatti della pizza servitaci, che non ha niente da invidiare a molte pizzerie italiane, bravi.
The pizza is pretty good and the staff were very courteous. I liked that the pizza was light and just enough for 2 people.
Always amazing. Fresh, delicious ingredients. The mushroom pizza is the best!!
Run to this place. So good from a non New Yorker's opinion. And the apple crisp with homemade whipcream....I mean YUMMMM
This is probably one of the best pizza places I've been to. Thin crust, flaming brick oven. Fantastic service. Pizza was delicious!!? Going back soon
Pizza is amazing
Rude service and overpriced cardboard tasting pizza.
Pizza was flavorful and ingredients fresh. Their is only one size. A 12 inch pan.  Menu is limited but enough to give a choice.
The Thin Crust pies are tasty and very filling.
Best pizza in Harlem by far....
Expensive but very delicious pizza.

Great wood fired pizza, with unusual and well combined toppings, good salads and calzones. They always have a few wines and local beers. The War Flag IPA was good. Service was also strong. I asked for a side of sauce expecting cold marinara in a plastic ramekin, but they put sauce in an aluminum container, added salt, spices and EVOO, and heated it in the oven for me. No charge. Very nice touch. Oh, but your oyster mushrooms are 90 percent cremini. You're not fooling anyone.
Awesome pizza!
The best pizza in the area hands down
Great pizza, great service!
Not the best pizza I've had in NY.
Food was good. The staff just stood behind the counter. They never asked if we needed anything else though. There were also street beggars entering and harassing the guests.

Had a wonderful experience here last Friday on my lunch break. It was a gorgeous day and this little pizza parlor was open to the sidewalk. The delicious scent drew me from the street and I ordered the Lexington which came covered in delicious pancetta and mushrooms. The freshest pizza I've had in years. The owner was very kind and personable.
Visiting from Miami, Florida. Too bad we can't take them home. Service with a smile and pizza was crispy and tasty. Great job!

This little small spot in harlem puts out a very delicious veggie pie. Not a fan of white sauce, I was pleasantly surprised by the taste of the pizza. You can see the pizza being made and placed in the brick oven from the seats.  The service was great and the food was delivered to the table in a timely manner despite them being busy with delivery orders.

Been a religious pizza eater here since it opened. Love the creative pizza specials they come up with. Total fan of their salads as well.  Ideal order: any pizza on the menu with an arugula salad. Idk what is in that dressing, but it elevate the salad and pizza to a whole new level.
Nice Pizza and good costumer service.!
Recently celebrated finishing the New York marathon by grabbing some pizza here and it was great. The stereo was a little loud but the staff were nice and the pizza was good.
Great pizza
It’s ok pizza I wouldn’t order again, very average, if not mediocre.
Fantastic pizza. Just a bit crowded inside.
For me, the pizza wasn't good enough for the price
Not the best but not bad for the price.
Pizza good - not all traditional toppings. Love the deco. Large pizza oven visible. Polite and accommodating! Will return.

Taste is just as delicious as presentation.  Friendly customer service.  No issues with making modifications on menu items.  Ambiance feels like a refreshing indoor meets outdoor combo restaurant you want to take a date to or reflect memories with good company. Uplifting.
Pizza is great!!! Bottomless mimosas even better!!! Pies r small 😐
Good pizza, quick service, good value for money

We've never eaten at the actual pizzeria but we''ve ordered delivery 3 times. The first 2 times, it was great. The pizza is delicious and the ingredients are very similar to the ones they use in Italy. The 3rd order was a disaster. The order was almost an hour and a half late. When I called them after an hour, they said they were just making the pizza now. She said it would take an hour, I told her it was already an hour. When we received the 3 pizzas, it was obvious that they were dropped and all 3 were a disaster, stuck to the top of the lid and the boxes were wet from the rain. The delivery man handed them to us wet without an insulated cover to keep them hot and dry. Needless to say I asked for my money back.
Great pizza
Tasty pizza with fresh and quality ingredients. The Lexington was a delight. Some pizza are a little bit pricey though.
The pizza is alright. The atmosphere is good. And even better out can customize your personal pizza
very very good pizza! definetly reccomend
Harlem pizza is the best
Delicious, freshmade, high quality pizza, and a beautiful place overall!
Badest  pizza ever. Burn and thin like a paper...only Good thing  is cooked  Old style...
Excellent pizza and vert good price
Nice place! Good service, good food. Chilled vibes.
Great food
This is easily one of the top 5 spots in NYC! Love it!
Fantastic pizza. Great combinations done in the itlian style. Thin crispy crust & top quality toppings.   The staff is friendly &the service was great. We'll worth the stop!

I absolutely adore this place.  I'm a sucker for red velvet cupcakes, and this place has my favorite in the city. The frosting is light, yet flavorful; the cake is fluffy and moist.  The Brooklyn Blackout Cake is to die for. The perfect cupcake for chocolate lovers, it's several layers of chocolate cake with chocolate pudding inside, topped with chocolate frosting. I thought the chocolate would overwhelm me (although I'm a chocolate lover), but the different types of chocolate within this one cupcake kept the cupcake interesting and desirable.  The yellow cake with chocolate frosting was also a delicious take on a "classic" style cupcake; it reminds you of what your grandma would have made for you when you were little (if your grandma was the type to bake cupcakes). Again, both the frosting and cake parts were worthwhile - both separately and together.  The New York cheesecake is also one of my favorite cheesecakes (the only place that has better is Zanze's in San Francisco). It's light, smooth, moist, and not overly sweet with a delicious crust that doesn't overpower the flavor of the cheesecake itself.  The lines here can be quite long - service is very friendly but slow. It's sweet that they chat it up with each customer, but it can be a bit frustrating when the line is out the door. Still, the cupcakes and cheesecake are all worth the wait.
Tasty pizza and very nice vibe! Loved the anchovy and olives pizza ($13)
Great pizza! Great staff! My new favorite!
Honestly, this place is great. Friendly staff and most importantly, GREAT pizza. Highly recommend.

I'm on a NY pizza quest, folks. I made a promise to myself that I'll try a new pizza joint every week. This opened 8 weeks ago and Yelp pointed me there. I got the Margherita pie to-go for about $12 dollars and there were 6 slices. They have a spanking new brick oven and they serve made-to-order pies. The place is small with full-service seating area that fits about 10-12 people.  The pizza is like a personal pan pizza, as it's very thin and small. I like the crust - it's chewy, fresh, soft inside and crunchy outside. The toppings are a joke, because they're too skimpy on the cheese and basil when I visited. It's pretty sad cause there's not even a single leaf on each slice. I've had at least 2-3 basil leaves on one slice from other places. Look at my picture and tell me if I'm wrong. Despite my love for pizza, I'll definitely not coming back for more.
Great place in Harlem for brick oven pizza. Came out at right temp be fresh ingredients.
Love, love, love. Best pizza.

Fabulous gourmet thin crust brick oven pizza!   There is the traditional margherita and many other wonderful varied combinations.  Wonderful salads and sausage too. Good wine list as well.  All yummy!  The staff is friendly.  This is a neighborhood gem.
Great service, good brick oven pizza made with fresh mozzarella and basil. The star of the show is the amazing Tiramisu.

Solid neighborhood pizzeria specializing in Neapolitan style pizzas, perfect for a casual lunch. There's a few tables available if you don't want to take-out, and they have beer available. Good salads and vegetarian options as well.
I love this place, employees are nice and pizza is amazing. Ingredients always so fresh
(Translated by Google) Very good! Pizza with thin and tasty pasta. Attention 10!  (Original) Muito bom! Pizza com massa fina e saborosa. Atendimento 10!
Wonderful gem of a place not to be missed. Great atmosphere, great pizza and great staff. We loved it.  Margarita pizza was just how it was supposed to be - delicious!
pizza was great loved the service wish they stayed open a bit later

Harlem Pizza Co. is by far the best pizza place in Harlem and one of the best pizza places in Manhattan. You won't regret ordering pizza from them for delivery or stopping by for a pie. The delivery staff is extremely friendly and nice. The entire experience is consistently outstanding. I've ordered pizza from them at least seven times so far.

GREAT pizza! Super fresh ingredients, just the right dough, and so many healthy choices to pick from! Beautiful service, and wonderful atmosphere. They also make VEGAN PIZZA which is DELICIOUS, everything is so fresh and tasteful, really really recommend this place. Will definitely be coming here a lot! MUST TRY!
Barely and basil on our margarita pizza...meh
♨ #BrickOven #Pizza comes to #Harlem NYC! We craft select custom pies to delight your tastebuds! And we deliver! Stop by when you're #Uptown!
